1179:13: akṛtāmiva tāṃ draṣṭvā cakre'nyāṃ madhyayā dhiyā ||4||
1179:22: āryamaitreyaḥ sadācārānuvṛttimātmanaḥ prakhyāpayan svapratisaṃvijjñānena prajñāpāramitāviṣayakaḥ prasāda eva sarvaśreyaḥ prāptipradhānaheturityavadhṛtya paraṃ niratiśayānantaguṇaratnākarabhagavatyāṃ pravartayituṃ prasādotpādanāya tāvadādau yathāguṇābhidhānapuraḥsuraṃ jananīṃ namaskurvannāha -
1179:25: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatā-
1179:29: dharmānusāriṇo'pi ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvādityādipramāṇena anutpannavastumārgākāraparijñānakārikārthalakṣaṇajananyāṃ bādhām adṛṣṭvā trisarvajñatāsvarūpatrayātmikā buddhādinirmātrī prajñāpāramitāvaśyameva sambhavinītyavadhṛtya tasyāṃ prasādamutpādayanti|
1179:30: tasyāṃ prasādena tadguṇābhilāṣiṇaḥ ubhayavidhā api pudgalāḥ tattadāśritapravacanadhāraṇādyarthaṃ sarvathā atyantamādriyante|
1179:32: ata eva bhagavatyāṃ pradāsa eva sarvaśreyo'dhigamahetuḥ|
1179:34: tābhiśca vakṣamāṇavidhinā sarvārthāḥ sampatsyanta iti manasi nidhāya trisarvajñatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ stauti|
1179:35: śrāvakaḥ, tatpakṣanikṣiptaḥ kiñcidvimokṣādhikaḥ ekakrama nirdiṣṭaḥ pratyekabuddhaśca nirvāṇabhilāṣiṇau,
1179:38: anutpannasarvākārajñatayā yayā saṅgatāḥ saṃyatakāyāḥ pradhānayogīśvarā buddhāḥ sarvathā caritapratipakṣasarvadharmacakrān pravartayanti|
1179:42: tathā hi na hi tadasti iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vastujātaṃ yanna lakṣaṇaśāstreṣu uktapūrvam|
1179:44: saṅgrahāt sāṃkleśikavastvasaṃgrahācca na jñāyate kasyāyaṃ pratipakṣa iti|
1179:46: iti nāpare śaṅkiṣyante kim iti cet ?
1179:47: tannaḥ, yato hi yathākramaṃ śrāvaka-pratyekabuddha-bodhisattvānuttarabuddhānāṃ trisarvajñatāyāṃ samastābhisamayānāṃ saṃgrahaṇena pakṣatrayasyāpi saṃgṛhītatvāt|
1179:61: yo buddhasya mārgaḥ sarve mārgā utpādyante jñāyante ca |
1179:84: rucisampannasattvahitecchayā karuṇāmayena tattajjinajananyāṃ sakalaprajñāpāramitārthāṣṭābhisamayakramo deśita eva,
1179:85: bhagavata āryājitajinasya tannidarśane kiṃ prayojanamitiśaṅkānirākaraṇārthasandehotpādanena pravṛttyaṅgaṃ svīyaśāstrābhidheya-prayojanaprayojanaprayojanāntarbhūtasambandhāṃśca pradarśayannāha -
1179:90: iti| sarvākārajñataiva hi buddhatvamārga iti sarveṣāmabhisamayānāmupalakṣaṇatvāttasyāmeva tātparyam|
1179:91: triprātihāryaiḥ sakalajanānuśāsakena bhagavatā jinajananītraye yo'bhidheyo deśitaḥ,
1179:93: bāhyetaravītarāgādibhiḥ sarvadharmanairātmyānabhyastaiḥ śrutamayādiprajñākrameṇānālīḍha iti suvyavasthāpite vāsanāsambhūtasmṛtijñāne bodhicittadānapratipattyācāramaṣṭābhisamayātmakamaśeṣaprajñāpāramitāsūtrārthaṃ samyagādhāya sarvatragadharmadhātvadhigamalakṣaṇapramuditabhūmyādyadhigamakrameṇa sarvākāraṃ sākṣātkuryāditi prayojanaprayojanāya vineyā abhilaṣitaprajñāpāramitārthabodhicittapratipattyādilakṣaṇāni sukhena pratipatsīranniti śāstrārambhaprayojanam ||
1179:95: evaṃ sambandhādīn vyāhṛtya vineyānāṃ sukhena pratipattaye supravibhaktasyāpi śāstrārthasya asaṃlulitatvena vyākhyānasaukaryamavalokya pañcadaśabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samāsavyāsanirdeśena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kāyikavyavasthāpanamāha -
1179:110: prajñayā na bhave sthānaṃ kṛpayā na śame sthitiḥ |
1179:120: pratyekaṃ darśanākhye ca bhāvanākhye ca vartmani|
1179:126: iti| tatra prathamakārikādvayena aṣṭavastūnāṃ saṃgrahāt samāsanirdeśaḥ,
1179:127: tataḥ trayodaśakārikābhiḥ tasyaivārthaṃ saṃgṛhya vistareṇa vyākhyānaṃ bhavati|
1179:129: piṇḍārthakārikāṇāmeva śāstrapraṇetrā 'cittotpādaḥ parārthāya' -ityādivakṣyamāṇasakalaśāstreṇa vyākhyāsyamānatvāt tadvyākhyānenaiva vyākhyānaṃ sañcintya vīpsābhayena nātraitā vyākhyātāḥ |
1179:132: itthaṃ sakalapiṇḍārtha nirdiśya bodhiṃ prāptukāmairbodhisattvaiḥ phalabhūtatvāt sarvākārajñatādhigantavyetyādau sarvākārajñatāsaṃgrahakārikāṃ vyākhyātukāmaḥ sālambanaṃ cittotpādasvarūpamāha-
1179:134: buddho bhūtvā yathābhavyatayā parārthaṃ prati yatnaṃ kuryāmiti parārthāya samyaksambodhyadhikāmatālakṣaṇaḥ praṇidhiprasthānasvabhāvo dvividhaścittotpādaḥ|
1179:139: kintu kuśaladharmacchandalakṣaṇāyāṃ prārthanāyāṃ satyāṃ bodhicittamutpadyata iti kāraṇenātra kāryaṃ nirdiṣṭamevaṃ prārthayituḥ bodhisattvasya sarve kuśalā dharmā vṛddhiṃ yāntīti jñāpanāya copacāraḥ samāśrita ityadoṣaḥ|
1179:140: anyaprakāreṇa praṇidhānaṃ prārthanā vā samyaksambodhikāmatā tatsahacaritacittotpādaḥ prārthanayātidiśyate|
1179:141: evañca praṇidhānasahagataṃ taccittamutpadyata iti jñāpanāya vā ||
1179:143: kaśca parārtho yatkāmatātmako yadarthaścittotpāda iti cet ? ucyate -
1179:144: samāsavyāsataḥ sā ca yathāsūtraṃ sa cocyate ||19 ||
1179:145: tisṛṣvapi jinajananīṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dānādau ca deyadāyakapratigrāhakādyanupalabdhiḥ pratipattavyeti jñāpanārthakena;
1179:147: matsariṇaśca dānādau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmenāsyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipattavyamitipradarśanapareṇa vacanena (vākyena)
1179:150: sarvākaragranthatātparyārthanirdeśāvasare sarvaṃ kathitaṃ tathāpi bahuvaktavyamāśaṅkya na (atra pradhānataḥ)
1179:152: evaṃ sālambanaṃ cittotpādasvarūpamabhidhāyedānīṃ tasya dvāviṃśatiprabhedān dvābhyāmantaraślokābhyāmāha-
1179:192: iti cittotpādabhedaḥ ādikarmikabhūmimārabhya yāvad buddhabhūmi saṅgṛhītaḥ |
1179:195: - bhedamabhidhāya utpāditaprathamādibodhicittāya yathākālaṃ bodhisattvāya prārthitārthabodhicittotpādāya tadākṣiptadharmasiddhaye prāptaguṇaparirakṣaṇenābhivṛddhaye copadeśo'vavāda ityata āha-
1179:200: yathoktaprabhedabodhicittapratipattau saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyānatikrameṇa śrāvakādyasādhāraṇatayā'nupalambhayogena vartanamiti śikṣaṇaṃ pratipattyavavādaḥ|
1179:203: nirodhe śūnyatāyāmutpādanirodhasaṃkleśavyavadānahānivṛddhyādirahitāyānna rūpaṃ yāvannāvidyotpādo nāvidyānirodho na buddho bodhiriti|
1179:204: mārge dānādipāramitābhirātmano'dhyātmaśūnyatādīnāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatādibhiḥ pūrvāntāparāntayośca parasparaṃ na yuktāyuktatvena pratipattirityupadeśaḥ satyāvavādaḥ |
1179:207: saṃghe buddharatnāntargatatvenārhadvarjyeṣu phalasthapratipannakabhedena saptasu mahāpuruṣeṣu pratyekabuddhena sahāṣṭāsu mṛdvindriyādibhedena viṃśatisaṃkhyāvacchinneṣyāryāvaivarttikabodhisattvaśaikṣeṣvanutpādatayā pravṛttirityupadeśo ratnatrayāvavādaḥ |
1179:208: ārabdhavīryatayā yathoktārthānuṣṭhānaṃ prati kāyādisukhallikatvena kasyacidabhiniveśaḥ syādityasaktau kāyādīnāmasvabhāvatayā deśanāvavādaḥ |
1179:209: ciratarakālābhyāsenāpi samīhitārthāniṣpattāvuttrasanajātīyasya parikhedaḥ syādityapariśrāntau rūpāderyāvat samyaksambodheramananatayā deśanāvavādaḥ |
1179:210: daśadigavasthitabuddhādibhyaḥ pratyarthaṃ mārgopadeśe gṛhyamāṇe cittāvalīnatā syāditi pratipatsamparigrahe dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtyajātatvena śikṣaṇamavavādaḥ |
1179:213: catuḥsatyasaṅgṛhītaṣoḍaśakṣaṇasvabhāvaṃ darśanamārgaṃ dharmānvayajñānakṣāntijñānātmakaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvabodhena māyākāra iva sarvatrānabhiniviṣṭamūrtistatprahātavyavastupratipakṣatvena yogī vibhāvayatīti deśanā darśanamārgāvavādaḥ |
1179:214: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtayorekarūpatvena parasparamaśakyavyatirekaprajñaptivad yathoktadarśanamārgasaṃmukhīkṛtavastvavyatirekālambanād darśanabhāvanayorapṛthagbhāva iti na lākṣaṇikaṃ bhāvanāmārgavyavasthānam,
1179:215: atha ca sa tatprahātavyavastupratipakṣatvena vibhāvyate pratītyasamutpādadharmatayeti deśanā bhāvanāmārgāvavāda ityevaṃ bodhicittatadākṣitpadharmasvabhāvaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yā pratipattiranupalambhākārā,
1179:224: tatsarvamavavādaprakaraṇe nirdiṣṭametāvataiva sarvo'rthaḥ sampanna iti daśavidho'vavādaḥ |
1179:240: tataḥ sa eva bhavāgragastu rūpavītarāgo dṛṣṭadharmaśamaḥ kāyasākṣīti aparo dvividhaḥ |
1179:249: bodhisattvānāṃ śrutādiprakarṣaprāptamokṣabhāgīyaśraddhādilakṣaṇakuśalamūlādūrdhvaṃ catuḥsatyaprativedhānukūlāni ca caturnirvedhabhāgīyāni laukikabhāvanāmayāni ūṣmaprāpta iti kuśalamūlam,
1179:252: tato'gradharma iti mṛdvādikrameṇa utpādo'thavā bodhisattvasambaddhamṛdvindriyādipudgalabhedena vakṣyamāṇamṛdumadhyādhimātrālambanaviśiṣṭavastvātmakacatuḥsatyālambanadharmadarśana-pratipakṣatvenānabhiniveśādyākāraviśeṣāt yānatrayādhigamahetutvaviśeṣādupāyakauśalakalyāṇamitralakṣaṇasamparigrahād darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyāṃ prahātavyā grāhyagrāhakacaturvikalpāḥ vakṣamāṇanayasambandhenotpannāḥ śrāvakādīnāmūṣmādibhyo viśiṣṭāḥ|
1179:260: yata idameva vyavasthāpanaṃ hyato'nyayānamāśritya kutrāpi dūṣaṇaṃ nābhidhātavyam |
1179:261: ālambanākārayoḥ kā viśeṣatā ityata ālambanākārau saptamiḥ antaraślokairāha -
1179:268: adhimuktinā tattvamanaskāreṇa ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ pratipatteḥ niṣedhasya cānupalambhanaṃ na samanudarśanamiti madhyasyālambanam |
1179:270: rūpamārabhya yāvadbuddha iti sarvadharmasāṅketiko vyāvahārikadharma ityadhimātrasyālambanam |
1179:280: paramārthena rūpādisarvadharmaśūnyatayoḥ parasparamekaṃ rūpamiti śūnyatāyāmanityatvādīnāmabhāvena rūpādau na nityānityādibhiḥ sthānamityākāraḥ |
1179:282: yaṃ svabhāvapratiṣedhenāsvīkāro rūpādīnāṃ sa ākāra iti |
1179:289: iti| atra śūnyatā rūpalakṣyalakṣaṇayorekatvenāsvabhāvo rūpādīnāmiti mṛduna ālambanam |
1179:299: iti| atra sarvadharmāṇāmanutpādasya vīraṃgamādīnāñca samādhirbhāvanīya iti mṛduna ālambanam |
1179:301: dharmataiṣā samyakpratipannasamādheryogino buddhairvyākaraṇaṃ kriyata iti madhyasyālambanam |
1179:302: sarvavikalpānupapattyā viditasamādhisvarūpasya bodhisattvasyāhaṃ samāhitaṃ ityādijñānaṃ na sambhavatītyākāraḥ |
1179:306: ālambanamanityādi satyādhāramatiricya ālambanaviśiṣṭākārayoḥ dharmadharmyabhidhāne satyapi ālambanaviśiṣṭākārayoḥ dharmābhidhānena sarvatra ucyamāne ṛte viśiṣṭāntaraparihārāparihārau nānayoḥ kaścit prativiśeṣa iti nyāyāt|
1179:307: athavā kārikācchandānurodhena bhinnābhidhāne'pi abhiniveśādiniṣedhayuktayoḥ tattvataḥ vidhānapratiṣedharahitatvād duḥkhādisatyāntargatamevālambanamākāraśca kriyete |
1179:321: prajñaptisatpuruṣādhiṣṭhānāḥ- skandha-āyatana- dhātu - pratītyasamutpāda -vyavadāna- darśana- bhāvanā -viśeṣa- aśaikṣamārgāśceti grāhakavikalpāḥ |
1179:323: sambaddhakārikānusāram uktapūrve'pi samparigrahe tadbalena yathoktaviśeṣo bhavatīti darśanāya tadanantaramantaraślokaḥ -
1179:343: pratipattidharmāvasthāntarabhedena trayodaśavidho bodhisattvo yathoktadharmādhāro dharmadhātusvabhāva eva gotramiti nirdiṣṭam |
1179:344: yadi dharmadhātorevāryadharmādhigamāya hetutvāttadātmako bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtisthamanuttarabuddhadharmāṇāṃ gotram,
1179:345: tadā tatsāmānyavartitvād 'na bodhisattva eveti' mandabuddhi puruṣaṃ pratyāśaṃkya antaraślokamāha-
1179:347: yathā śrāvakayānādyadhigamakrameṇālambeta tathāryadharmādhigamāya dharmadhātorhetubhāvena vyavasthāpanād gotratvena vyapadeśa ityapi samādhiḥ dṛśyate,
1179:367: samyaksambuddhasantānodayadharmīṇi daśabalāni ityevamadhigamānukrameṇa sarvadharmā yathāvadālambyanta ityālambanamekādaśavidham |
1179:376: ityevaṃ pratipattyādhārādīn abhidhāya kiñca tatsvarūpamiti cet?
1179:378: sarvākārābhisambodhādau caturvidhe'bhisamaye pratyabhisamayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitādhiṣṭhānā ca kriyā paripattiḥ|
1179:379: evaṃ yathāvat prayogadarśanabhāvanāviśeṣamārgasvabhāvānāṃ pratipattilakṣaṇānāṃ sannāhaprasthānasambhāraniryāṇānāṃ madhye vīryarūpatayā sannāhapratipattiṃ prathamāmāha-
1179:380: dānādau ṣaḍvidhe teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ saṃgraheṇa yā |
1179:390: prajñāyā bhāvanā ityevaṃ dānādiṣaṭpāramitāsu pratyekaṃ dānādau saṃgṛhītāsu ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaṭkaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadvidyā bhavanti dānādisādharmyācca ṣaṭ sannāhapratipattayo bhavanti |
1179:401: yuganaddhaśca yo mārgaṃ upāye yacca kauśalam ||47||
1179:402: jñānaṃ puṇyaṃ mārgaśca dhāraṇī bhūmayo daśa |
1179:404: mahākaruṇa-dāna-śīla-vīrya-dhyāna-prajñā-śamatha-vidarśanā-yuganaddhamārga- upāyakauśala- jñāna- puṇya- darśanādimārga- vacanādidhāraṇī- bhūmi- pratipakṣāṇāmanupalambhena saṃvṛtisatyānatikrameṇa samastamahāyānārthapratipatterebhiḥ karuṇādibhiḥ samyak-pratipatsvābhāvyāt mahābodhigrahaṇāt mahākaruṇādisambhārā iti saptadaśa sambhārapratipattayaḥ |
1179:405: tatra jñānasambhāraḥ ādhyātmika-bāhya- tadubhaya-śūnyatā-mahat- paramārtha- saṃskṛta- asaṃskṛta- atītānanta- anavarāgra- anavakāra- prakṛti-sarvadharma- lakṣaṇa-anupalambha- abhāvasvabhāva- bhāva- abhāva- svabhāva- parabhāvaśūnyatānāṃ bhedena viṃśatidhā |
1179:412: bhūmisambhāreṇa daśabhūbhaya iti pariṣkriyamāṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃdarśanāya trayoviṃśatirantaraślokā kathyante-
1179:429: satyavāditetyevamebhirdaśabhirlakṣaṇadharmaiḥ sarvathotpadyamānattvāt parikarmabhiḥ kāraṇaviśeṣaiḥ svabhāvānupalambhatayā kṛtaviśeṣalakṣaṇaparikarmabhireva prathamā pramuditā bhūmiḥ prāpyate |
1179:431: śīlaṃ kṛtajñatā kṣānti pramodyaṃ mahatī kṛpā |
1179:440: dānādiṣaṭpāramitāsu paryeṣṭirityevaṃ kṛtaparikarmaviśeṣeṇāṣṭaprakāradharmeṇa dvitīyā vimalā bhūmiradhigamyate |
1179:442: atṛptatā śrute dānaṃ dharmasya ca nirāmiṣam |
1179:449: svaparāpekṣayā akuśaladharmākaraṇamityevaṃ pañcadhā parikarmaṇā pūrvavat kṛtānavabudhyamānasvabhāvaparikarmaṇā tṛtīyā prabhākarī bhūmiravabudhyate |
1179:478: sarvarāgādisarvakleśābhimukhīkaraṇaṃ cetyevaṃlakṣaṇān daśadharmān vivarjayan arthādākṣiptaviparyayadharmeṇa daśaprakāraparikarmaṇā pūrvavat pañcamī sudurjayā bhūmirākramyate |
1179:483: kṛśo'pi nārthināṃ kṣeptā ṣaṣṭhīṃ bhūmiṃ samaśnute ||59||
1179:484: dānādiṣaṭpāramitāparipūraṇena śrāvakapratyekabuddhābhilāṣasya svabhāvānupalambhotttrāsasya ca yācakajanaprārthanāsaṃkocasya svarasapravṛttasarvārthatyāgadaurmanasyasya dāridryādarthijanapratikṣepacittasya ca varjanenetyevaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ parikarmabhiḥ pūrvavat ṣaṣṭhī abhimukhī bhūmirājñāyate |
1179:492: iti| ātmasattvajīvapudgalocchedaśāśvatanimittahetuskandhadhātvāyatanatraidhātukādhiṣṭhāna-saktyālīnacittabuddhadharmasaṃghaśīladṛṣṭyabhiniveśaśūnyatāvivādavirodhodbhāvanāgrahotsṛṣṭayaścetyevaṃ viṃśatiprakārakalaṅkāpagamādākṣiptaviparyayadharmeṇa viṃśatiprakāreṇa parikarmadharmeṇa pūrvavat saptamī dūraṅgamā bhūmiḥ samīyate |
1179:520: vineyānurūpaṃ sarvatra svakāyaprakāśanamiti viṃśatiprakāreṇānena parikarmadharmeṇāpi pūrvavat saptamī bhūmiḥ samīyate |
1179:550: buddhabuddhadharmasvabhāvaguṇaparipūraṇañcetyevaṃ sampattilakṣaṇairdvādaśabhiḥ parikarmabhiḥ pūrvavatkṛtaparikarmaviśeṣairnavamī sādhumatī bhūmiḥ sākṣātkriyate|
1179:552: hetubhūmitvena tatparikarmāṇyevaṃ nirdiśya phalabhūmitvena pṛthak tānyanabhidhāya saṅgrahaṇena daśamabhūmilakṣaṇamāha-
1179:554: yena jñānena sā jñeyā daśamī bodhisattvabhūḥ||71||
1179:555: iti| śrāvakādigotra-prathamaphalapratipannaka-srota-āpanna-sakṛdāgāmi-anāgāmi-arhatāmiti ṣaṇṇāṃ nayatrayavyavasthāpanābhiprāyeṇa śeṣasaṅgṛhītāpannakatrayasya pratyekabuddhasya ca yathākramaṃ gotra-aṣṭamaka-darśana-tanu-vītarāga-kṛtavikalpa-śrāvaka- pratyekabuddhabhūmayaḥ,
1179:556: bodhisattvānāṃ yathoktā navavidhetyevaṃ navabhūmīratikramya daśamyāṃ punaḥ bhūmau bodhisattvo buddha eva vaktavyo na tu samyaksambuddha iti vacanāt buddhabhūmau yena praṇidhānajñānenāvatiṣṭhate sā eva daśamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ jñeyā |
1179:561: iti| sāṃkleśikavastumātrapratipakṣādhiṣṭhānagrāhyavikalpadvayasya dravyapudgalaprajñaptipuruṣādhiṣṭhānagrāhakavikalpadvayasya ca darśanamārgabhāvanāmārgayoḥ prahāṇād grāhyagrāhakāṣṭavikalpopaśāntaye satyadvayamāśritya sākṣātkaraṇīyā vipakṣabhedena mārgadvayāvasthāyāmeva aṣṭavidhāḥ pratipakṣāḥ |
1179:574: yathoktasarvākārajñatā tadviśiṣṭamārga ityevaṃ niryātavyavastuṣu prativiśiṣṭānyadharmābhāvena sarvānupalambhatayā ebhiraṣṭābhirniryāṇapratipattiḥ aṣṭadhā bhavati |
